allow:
Bash(gh issue create --title "UCP Merchant Directory - Public registry of UCP-enabled sites" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Description
Create a public directory/registry of UCP-enabled merchant sites. **No one else has this** - first-mover opportunity.

## Value
- Unique resource in the UCP ecosystem
- Drives traffic as the go-to place to discover UCP merchants
- Builds community and network effects
- SEO for "UCP merchants", "UCP enabled stores"

## Features
- [ ] Database to store validated UCP merchants
- [ ] Public directory page with search/filter
- [ ] Auto-add sites that pass validation \(opt-in\)
- [ ] Categories \(e-commerce platform, industry, region\)
- [ ] Badge for listed merchants \("Listed on UCPtools Directory"\)
- [ ] API endpoint to query directory

## Technical Considerations
- Storage: Vercel KV, Supabase, or similar
- Moderation: prevent spam/fake entries
- Privacy: only list with merchant consent

## Effort
Medium

## Priority
High - First-mover advantage
EOF
\)" --label "enhancement,first-mover,priority:high")
